name: Dance Dance Revolutionaries BetaV.2
description:
It is me AKking! I have gone through time and brought together  revolutionaries from all over history to re-create Dance Dance Revolution!  But theirs a problem :/ when i was taking them out of their time period some of them lost cognitive function :|

But fret not! For you will be able to take control of these brave revolutionaries! Dont worry i'll walk you through it first tho :3
